events.title: A Thousand Horses
events.location: Leesburg, Virginia, United States Of America
events.description: ROCKING FOR TODD! Special fundraiser for Battalion Chief Todd Zippy Webber. ONE NIGHT ONLY! Come out and join us for 1 night as we come together to listen to A Thousand Horses and help raise money for Todd Zippy Webber, Battalion Chief with Loudoun Fire-Rescue, who was injured in an ATV accident earlier this year. Get in on some door prizes, a 50/50 cash raffle, and a special beer courtesy of our friends at Black Hoof Brewing! Donations also accepted directly through this QR code with all proceeds going to benefit Zippy and his family. Good music with good friends for a GREAT cause.
